De Lange leads the team of the field to a resounding cheer, receives the innings-ball from the umpires as well to keep. Excellent bowling from the young man picking up five and tearing thorugh the Aussie middle-order after getting Marsh as well.
Innings Start
Watson to face the first ball and Hughes the non-striker.
